home.title: Hi! I'm Eric.
home.subtitle: Thanks for coming by.
home.body: While you're here, you may learn a little bit more <0>about me</0>, review my <1>work experience</1>, or take a look at my current <2>certifications</2>.
home.contact: Also, if you think my skills may be of help for a problem you currently have, feel free to <0>reach out</0>.

about.title: About
about.description: Here you can learn a little bit more about me.
about.heading: A little bit about me.
about.img1: This is a picture of me.
about.img2: This is a picture of El Pilar, in Zaragoza.
about.img3: This is a picture of my dog, Kiwi.
about.heading1: I am Eric Trigo, a freelance dev mainly focused on .NET, containers and the cloud.
about.body1:
I've never known life without computers, for better or worse. I learned how to code very early in my life, thanks to <0>my dad and <1>brother.

Although I've spent most of my career doing backend development based around the .NET ecosystem, these days you're more likely to find me fixing a broken CI/CD pipeline or deploying containers to a Kubernetes cluster.
about.heading2: I live in <0>Saragossa, Spain, from where I work remotely.
about.body21:
<0>Music is one of my biggest passions, which I inherited from my dad.

These songs put me in a good mood, I hope you like them too 😃
about.body22:
I have been playing guitar since I was little, and when I was younger I wrote a few songs.

Here's one I recorded many years ago, check it out!
about.heading3: Me and my partner have a little Dachshund. His name is Kiwi.
about.body3: His size is inversely proportional to his evilness. He likes to help me code sometimes. If I lose track of him for one second he'll try to push to master directly, so I've learned to always keep my branches protected!

experience.title: Experience
experience.description: My work experience sorted by more recent.
experience.heading: My work experience, sorted by more recent.

jobs.desc1: First time as a DevOps engineer in a low-code, R&D solution. Multicloud (Azure/AWS) day-2 operations + development. Together with my team, built from scratch a .NET 5 microservice which deployed code-generated apps to K8s clusters. Before that as part of the .NET team, built a .NET Core code generator. Member of Technical Office team.
jobs.desc2: Consulting work done at an airline. First time in a team lead role and making use of CI/CD pipelines (as a dev/user).
jobs.desc3: First stint as a consultant at a large bank. Handled the policy renewal process for a life insurance solution.
jobs.desc4: Switched desktop for web backend development. Here's where I began learning .NET Core, WebAPI and Git.
jobs.desc5: .NET desktop development for a video surveillance software suite.
jobs.desc7: First contact with .NET and agile methodologies (Scrum).
